meanings.definition: Unable to be measured or calculated.
meanings.sent1: The love a parent feels for their child is immensurable.
meanings.sent2: The vastness of the universe is truly immensurable.
meanings.sent3: The number of cookies I can eat in one sitting is immensurable!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an immensurable ocean that enveloped everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range stood before them, an immensurable barrier to their journey.

meanings.definition: Too large or extreme to be measured or understood.
meanings.sent1: The immensurable size of the whale left the onlookers in awe.
meanings.sent2: The immensurable power of the storm caused widespread destruction.
meanings.sent3: The immensurable amount of ice cream he ate made him sick.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, an immensurable force of joy.
meanings.sent5: The immensurable beauty of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.
